name: Asylum - 13 (Thirteen) - Pandemonium - 60X8.5
additionalNotes: The Asylum 13 Pandemonium is a full-bodied cigar that features an Ecuadorian Sumatra wrapper, Nicaraguan binder and filler. The result is delicious notes of spice, wood, leather, pepper and cocoa in every puff. Up to this date, Pandemonium is the brand’s strongest and boldest cigar. It’s a Nicaraguan puro made in Nicaragua and Each is rolled to a massive 8 ½ inches in length, and offered in varying ring gauges to tip the scales in the big smoke lover’s favor. The team of highly skilled blenders at Asylum employed a stunning Ecuador Sumatra wrapper and a core of aged Honduran binder and filler tobaccos.
